background.code: let cols = 20; let rows = 20; let size = 10; let xoff = 0; let yoff = 0; let zoff = 0; let inc = 0.1; let heightInc = 0.05;  let maxHeight = 150;  function setup() {   createCanvas(400, 400, WEBGL);   rectMode(CENTER);   angleMode(DEGREES); }  function draw() {   background(220);      rotateX(-45);   rotateY(45);      xoff=0;   for (let i=0; i<cols; i++) {     yoff = 0;     for (let j=0; j<rows; j++) {       const boxHeight = map(noise(xoff, yoff, zoff), 0, 1, 0, maxHeight);       yoff += inc;              let r = noise(zoff) * 255;       let g = noise(zoff+10) * 255;       let b = noise(zoff+40) * 255;              fill(r, g, b);       push();       translate(i*size - width / 4, 0, j*size - width / 4);       box(size, boxHeight, size);       pop();     }     xoff += inc;   } }  function mouseWheel(event) {   const delta = event.delta;   /* Keep the symbol so when you scroll up it goes back to the previous shape */ zoff += heightInc * (delta / Math.abs(delta)); }
